title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression (row[0]) is set
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set returns the wrong result or just returns a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '
EB: The data set should display a relevant error message when an invalid filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' is set.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected Result:
A relevant error message should be displayed when the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set.
